body_html: @Tweakmind : thanks for getting back to me on this. Yes, I got it working for Ubuntu, and still have no luck with Mac OSX (10.12.6) with an eGPU (1080 Ti). For all the sources I followed, build failed after some 10-15 minutes. It would be great if we have a reproducible success. Thanks in advance.
